verse: For Adonai will have compassion on Ya‘akov — he will once again choose Isra’el and resettle them in their own land, where foreigners will join them, attaching themselves to the house of Ya‘akov.

Peoples will take and escort them to their homeland, and the house of Isra’el will possess them in the land of Adonai as male and female slaves. They will take their captors captive and rule over their oppressors.
Then, when Adonai gives you rest from your suffering and trouble and from the hard service imposed on you,
you will take up this taunt-song against the king of Bavel:
